description: Advertisement Consent to change from an internally illuminated printed display to an LCD screen at an existing bus shelter.
decision_conditions: <p>1. No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.</p><p>2. No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to</p><p style="margin-left: 25px;">(a)endanger persons using any highway, railway, waterway, dock, harbour or aerodrome (civil or military);<br>(b)obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of, any traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air; or<br>(c)hinder the operation of any device used for the purpose of security or surveillance or for measuring the speed of any vehicle.</p><p>3. Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a condition that does not impair the visual amenity of the site.</p><p>4. Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not endanger the public.</p><p>5. Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the site shall be left in a condition that does not endanger the public or impair visual amenity.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.295;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposed illuminated LCD advertisement hereby approved, shall display static advertisement images only and not at any time display any moving imagery.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.295;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To avoid the distraction of nearby vehicular users and safeguard pedestrian and highway safety in the locality.</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></div>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.295;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposed illuminated LCD advertisement hereby approved, shall display static advertisement images only and not at any time display any moving imagery.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.295;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To avoid the distraction of nearby vehicular users and safeguard pedestrian and highway safety in the locality.</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></div>
